评论详情: Unfortunately this was too big. But decent quality

wear with caution… everyone finds this hot, if they don’t they’re still going to be staring at you for other reasons. jokes aside this choker is very cute- I get metal rashes pretty frequently but I haven’t gotten one from this! 4 stars because there’s only 3 buttons and the smallest one is a little too loose for me. it might be nice to have two buttons, if not to increase the size, then to tuck the longer tail when using one of the smaller buttons
My daughter got this to match her harley quinn costume.  It was a great fit for my 8 year old.  Definitely way to small for an adult.  Easily snaps.

评论详情: It fits... but just barely. Big girls beware.
This was used for homemade harley costume, worked perfect because it fit just right! It wasn't itchy or bothering through the day! So cute and great deal!
Very cute. Perfect for old school Harley costume <3
Perfect gift for my harley loving friend.
Perfect touch to Harley Quinn. Very comfortable. Got many compliments and my husband loved it.

This item is listed as a choker but it is no where near a choker length for the average to petite sized necks, I could honestly almost wrap it around my thigh (I'm 110 lbs).  It was almost stunning how incredibly huge it was, it actually hung around my neck past my collarbones.  It would've been quite comical if I wasn't so irritated already by that point when I realized I definitely could not wear this for my Harley Quinn costume.
Pretty good quality for the price, fits nicely. Mine had a crease from the way it was folded in the package, but I tied it to a large jar for a couple days and it looks just right now.
